content: Hey Abhishek, great read as always! I’m struggling to connect the Zomato vs Swiggy battle to the Aggregation Theory. The way i see it: Swiggy would have to start owning the supply chain by cooking Swiggy branded food and be successful; for us to say “it went against the Aggregation Theory”.Both Zomato and Swiggy are still aggregating Restaurants for end users. Except one decided to own delivery and dispatch.I’m skeptical of your claim that Swiggy is dominating food delivery. Any source for this?
